message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a high-quality item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm really interested in the product, but $120 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $90?
I understand that $90 is a bit lower than my initial offer, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell it to you for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $110 is still a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $95?
I can see you're really interested in the product, and I appreciate your persistence. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell it to you for $105.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but $105 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm really interested in the product, but I can only go up to $98. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $98?
I'm starting to think you're a tough negotiator, Bob! I like that. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I get a fair price. I can sell it to you for $100.
